Justia Lawyer Directory by the Numbers: Third Quarter 2022

We’re back with this year’s third edition of Justia Lawyer Directory by the Numbers! We looked at the data and trends for our directory in July, August, and September of this year and are sharing new data with all of you.

Justia Free Resources: Debt Relief & Management Center

Falling behind on financial obligations is stressful for anyone, and aggressive collection methods can increase the pressure. Fortunately, federal law protects people in debt from certain abuses by collectors. The Debt Relief & Management Center at Justia discusses these rights and describes strategies that consumers can use to manage their financial burdens.

Justia Free Resources: Employment Law Info for All 50 States

In addition to protections provided by federal laws, employees have important rights under their state’s laws. However, these state laws vary greatly. That’s where Justia helps! Learn more about our 50-state surveys of state employment laws on diverse topics.

The Power of a Personal Profile for Individual Attorneys

Social Media is a powerful tool for law firms, and the power of social media extends beyond just law firm business pages! In parallel, personal profiles for your attorneys can help build their personal professional brands while still marketing your law firm. Keep reading to learn more.
